entry.title: $2250 // Beautiful Bright CORNER 1 bedroom BALCONY_Granite Kitchen w/DW_pets OK
entry.content:
Beautiful CORNER 1 bedroom w/ BALCONY

Listing ID #: 155026
Price: $2,250
Property Type: Apartment
Bedrooms: 1.0
Bathrooms: 1.0

Building Amenities

Elevator
Garage
Laundry
Wheelchair Access

Apartment Amenities

Balcony
Dishwasher
Granite Kitchen
Hardwood
High Ceilings
Light
Outdoor Space
Renovated

Spacious 1 bedroom in luxury building in the heart of Astoria Virtual doorman entry to the lobby with 24 hour surveillance. The roof-deck is landscaped and furnished and offers unobstructed NYC views and beautiful RFK bridge exposure. Free bike storage. Laundry on-site. The apartment is a corner unit and includes a private balcony. Spacious for great entertaining during the summer months. The bedrooms has 2 walls of windows and a large closet. Hardwood flooring throughout. The kitchen is large with stone counters and lacquer cabinetry. All stainless steel appliances. Deep soaking tub in the bath with tiling to the ceiling and medicine cabinet. Central heating and cooling throughout the home Just 25 seconds to the Astoria Blvd N/Q train hub. Starbucks and Dunkin Donuts is on the next corner. Walking distance to Astoria Parks track and fields. 7 minute commute to Midtown.

Contact me to schedule your viewing!

Olga Breise

Phone: (646) 836-1673
Email: olga@bouklisgroup.com

The Bouklis Group
